item.title: CMS Updates Medicare Advantage Star Ratings for 2026
item.description: CMS has finalized the 2026 Star Ratings measures

item.title: Prior Authorization Requirements for Advanced Imaging
item.description: MA plans must implement prior auth for MRI CT and PET scans

item.title: Telehealth Services Extended Through 2025
item.description: CMS extends telehealth flexibilities through December 2025

item.title: Part D Drug Coverage Updates
item.description: New Part D rules cap insulin costs at 35 dollars

item.title: Network Adequacy Standards Strengthened
item.description: MA plans must meet stricter network requirements in 2026
